body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! This is Terry Murphy from Fresh Squeeze Delights. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Terry! I'm Kathryn Morris. I had a bit of an issue at one of your Juice Bars and I wanted to discuss it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Kathryn. But I'm here to help! Could you please provide me with your membership number and the date of your visit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure! My membership number is four five six seven eight nine, and I visited on June fifth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Kathryn. Now, could you tell me more about the customer service issue you experienced?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, of course. The staff was actually very friendly, but my order was mixed up with someone else’s. It was resolved quickly, but I just wanted to mention it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Kathryn. Mix-ups can happen, but I'm glad to hear our staff resolved it promptly. Your feedback is valuable to us. Is there anything else I can do for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was it. I'm actually happy with how it was handled. I just thought you should know.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Kathryn. We appreciate you taking the time to give us feedback. It helps us improve. Thank you!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Terry. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kathryn! If you have any more questions or feedback in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time. Have a wonderful day!
